Posts.Content: Hi, My sister in law is in her third round of Chemo, etc. She had surgery 22 years ago and was clear until 2004. She is on the same meds you talked about. Help me encourage her. and help me know what to be for her. It is in her bone. She is now having difficulty raising her arm because of the growth. Rose
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Mets to Bone Treatments

Posts.Content: Hi, My diagnosis is a stage 4. I had 22 years free then two years ago it bloomed again. It is all over. I have been on numerous chemo for the last two years. Some radiation. The big thing was the brain stem tumors that I had to deal with last week. Radiation took care of them for now. Sister in law of Rose
Posts.Title: Returned Stage 4

Posts.Content: Hi, Thanks for responding. I appreciate you prayer. However, it is my sister-in-law Eleanor that is the one going through all of this. The doctors said that at the time of the original cancer, one little cell or so was not found. It took that many years to read its ugly self. We both will accept all the prayer we can get. Thanks and prayers to you. If you are just starting this road, remember that 22 years ago they didn't know what they know now. That the nutitional side is much better and there is more information and more surviviors all the time. Blessings, Rose
Posts.Title: Returned Stage 4

Posts.Content: My sister in law just passed on her stage four lasted 2 1/2 years. The last 6 weeks it was eatting her alive. They had her on oxicontatin and it was releaving the pain. She had not life and we shall miss her. The medical doctors here didn't do what they needed to do at first and wated too long to begin treatment. (I don't know why) Rose
Posts.Title: Stage 4 Into Spine

Posts.Content: Hi, I hurt for you. This is so hard to deal with. Anyway, there is a research Clinic in springfield Utah. They use essential oils and other treatments. I have heard that they have good results. It is called Young Living Research Clinic. I don't have a phone number but I think you can find it on line. I wish you the best. Blessings to you. Rose
Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?

Posts.Content: Hi, As I udnerstand this, it has helped many feel better. don't know how it effects cancer. Get a good "organic"dentist as the opening of the mercury in the fillings can harm you as it is removed. I read that it can cause toxins to get into the system and one may not feel well for a time. So a good colon cleanse would be good if you can. The article I read is The Master Cleanse and it uses lemon. The book cost abour $3. Rose

Posts.Title: Has Anyone Had Success With Alternative Treatments?

Posts.Content: Hi, I agree, see a doctor. It may be nothing but swollen lymph gland and it may be something else. It is better to know than to wonder. Rose
Posts.Title: is it Possible?

Posts.Content: Hi, My sister in law, a twenty two year survivor, has gotten cancer again. The treatments were withheld for months then hit hard. She had has two years of chemo-multiple types and radiation. She is a fighter but is losing the battle. I am not sure the medical community that she choose did enough care soon enough. But on the othere hand, the choice is always theirs(her and her husband). Any way the chemo and the radiation aren't enough this time. No more surgeries. She is dying. she is now is hospice. At one time, she was taking the nurtition along with the mediciations. The newer doctors intergrate both. Her markers were going down and she was feeling better. They chose to stop this as the "medical" alone would do it. It wasn't doing it before and now it is too late. Please, talk to the doctors at cancer treatment and nurtional assistance along with the treatmens. It will help you survive the medicines. It will make your life a little easier and it is worth it. I have seen others come out of stage 4 doing both. I will and do miss the person who is going away. I hurt for her. I hate watching what this is and has done to her. Her mind, body, and life. It is hard to say goodbye. It is hard to share when the normal things are not important anymore. Sorry. Rose
Posts.Title: Radiation and Chemo Not Enough

Posts.Content: Hi, My sister in law has a major mass in her left chest area. She is currently on chemo but it is not helping much. Help...any survivors out there. Rose
Posts.Title: Muscle of Left Chest in Breast Cancer Survivor

Posts.Content: Hi, I am so, so glad that you are a survivor. I think the expereinces you talk about are due to the chemo cutting the nuritional needs as you heal. Get on super nurtitional stuff and the emotionals things should be better. I know form other surgeries that the after is both very happy and and downer. It takes time to get the body back in balance. Rose
Posts.Title: For All You Beautiful Ladies...

Posts.Content: Hi, The information you have, I have not heard of. the cancer treatment center has several supplements that build the immune system. We found a Dr. Hsia that is excellent and her cancer markers were coming down. She quit taking them and is now leaving us. We sill so miss her. The outcome may have been the same but now there is no choice. Rose
Posts.Title: Supplements

Posts.Content: Hi, My sister in law has a tumor growing in the muscle wall of the chest. She survived breast cancer years ago and this is a new thing. She is on chemo an dit isn't holding the thing. How do stop and reduce this growth. Rose
Posts.Title: Growing Cancer in Muscles of Chest
